sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"估价，估计"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: estimate, appraise, assess, evaluate, value, rate
means: estimate ： 通常指由个人作出的主观估价。
appraise ： 指以专家身份作了最终精确的估价。
assess ： 原义指对为确定交多少税而估计，引申指通过估价以便更好利用。
evaluate与appraise相似，指使判断绝对准确，但多用于对人物的某方面的评价，很少用于评价某物的市场价值。
value ： 侧重指一般人对某物的价值或价格所作的估计。
rate ： 专指评定价值等级的高低。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"价值"之意。
means: worth与value近义，但前者强调事物本身的价值。
value ： 侧重指使用价值，着重人、物或事所具有的重要性、用途或优秀品质等。

word_mean: 价值，价，值：特定物质的活性、浓度的定量表示，见normal vs
［of a quantity］ 用一个数和一个合适的计量单位表示的量。

sentence.Network_en: If they value these data, let them pay for them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们要是看重这些数据，就让他们出钱买。

sentence.Network_en: Over a given period, the value of shares will rise and fall.
sentence.Network_cn: 股票的价值在某一特定的时期内会有涨跌。

sentence.Network_en: She's kicked her drug habit and learned that her life has value.
sentence.Network_cn: 她已经戒了毒，并且认识到了生命可贵。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit.)used in reference to something that is well worth the money spent on it

lj.lj_ly: this camera is really good value for money.
lj.lj_ls: 这只照相机真的物有所值。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, feminine past participle of valoir 'be worth', from Latin valere

encyclopedia.content: 基本意思 value 汉语意思：价值，价格，重要性，评价，估价，重视。在英语中一般与of连用，即 value of 词组，意为某某的价值，某某的价格。 函数意思 VALUE函数是office办公软件excel表格中的一种函数，该函数可以将代表数字的文本字符串转换成数字，其语法结构为：VALUE(text),VALUE函数只有一个参数text，表示需要转换成数值格式的文本。 程序意思 value 在很多编程程中中都作为属性或者关键字。 C#的datetime类中 可以使用dat

entry.def: The value of something such as a quality, attitude, or method is its importance or usefulness. If you place a particular value on something, that is the importance or usefulness you think it has.

example.ex: The value of this work experience should not be underestimated...
example.tran: 这种工作经验的重要性不应该被低估。

example.ex: Further studies will be needed to see if these therapies have any value...
example.tran: 这些治疗是否有效需要进行进一步的研究。

entry.def: If you value something or someone, you think that they are important and you appreciate them.

example.ex: I've done business with Mr Weston before. I value the work he gives me...
example.tran: 我以前和韦斯顿先生有过业务往来，我很重视他给我的业务。

example.ex: If you value your health then you'll start being a little kinder to yourself.
example.tran: 如果你重视自己的健康，你就要开始对自己好一点。

entry.def: The value of something is how much money it is worth.

example.ex: The value of his investment has risen by more than $50,000...
example.tran: 他投入的资本已经增值了5万多美元。

example.ex: The company's market value rose to $5.5 billion...
example.tran: 该公司的市值涨到了55亿美元。

entry.def: When experts value something, they decide how much money it is worth.

example.ex: Your lender will then send their own surveyor to value the property...
example.tran: 然后贷款方会派他们自己的评估员来对房产进行估价。

example.ex: I asked him if he would have my jewellery valued for insurance purposes...
example.tran: 我问他能否给我的珠宝进行保险估价。

entry.def: You use value in certain expressions to say whether something is worth the money that it costs. For example, if something is or gives good value, it is worth the money that it costs.

example.ex: The restaurant is informal, stylish and extremely good value...
example.tran: 这家餐厅氛围轻松，装修雅致，而且价格非常公道。

example.ex: Both offer excellent value at around £90 for a double room...
example.tran: 两家的双人客房都报出了大约90英镑的超值价格。

entry.def: The values of a person or group are the moral principles and beliefs that they think are important.

example.ex: The countries of South Asia also share many common values...
example.tran: 南亚各国也有许多相同的价值观。

example.ex: The Health Secretary called for a return to traditional family values.
example.tran: 卫生部部长呼吁传统家庭价值观的回归。

entry.tran: 重要特点，显著特点（用于其他名词后）
entry.def: Value is used after another noun when mentioning an important or noticeable feature about something.

example.ex: The script has lost all of its shock value over the intervening 24 years...
example.tran: 时隔24年后，这个剧本已经完全失去了震撼力。

example.ex: Having a mid-morning party certainly adds novelty value.
example.tran: 在上午10点左右开派对一定会增加新鲜感。

entry.def: A value is a particular number or quantity that can replace a symbol such as 'x' or 'y' in a mathematical expression.

means.word_mean: 1. a numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed;
2. the quality (positive or negative) that renders something desirable or valuable;

sentences.sentence: "the Shakespearean Shylock is of dubious value in the modern world"

means.word_mean: 3. the amount (of money or goods or services) that is considered to be a fair equivalent for something else;

sentences.sentence: "he tried to estimate the value of the produce at normal prices"

means.word_mean: 4. relative darkness or lightness of a color;

sentences.sentence: "I establish the colors and principal values by organizing the painting into three values--dark, medium...and light"-Joe Hing Lowe

means.word_mean: 5. (music) the relative duration of a musical note
6. an ideal accepted by some individual or group;
1. fix or determine the value of; assign a value to;

sentences.sentence: "value the jewelry and art work in the estate"

means.word_mean: 4. place a value on; judge the worth of something;

sentences.sentence: "I will have the family jewels appraised by a professional"
"How would you rate his chances to become President?"
"Gold was rated highly among the Romans"

stems_affixes.word_buile: valu价值+able能……的→adj.贵重的,有价值的 n.[n.]贵重物品,财宝
valu价值+e→n.价值,价格 n.&v.估价, 评价
valu价值+able能……的→adj.贵重的,有价值的 n.[n.]贵重物品,财宝
valu价值+e→n.价值,价格 n.&v.估价, 评价
valu价值+ate表动词→v.对……作估价,对……作评价
de下降+valuate[v.对……作估价,对……作评价]→v.[使]贬值
under下面+value价值→在原有价值下面→低估
e出+valuate[v.对……作估价,对……作评价]→出价值→评价

Sentence.sentence: The academic value of the courses.
They value the environmental quality they preserve over their oil imports from abroad
The value of listed shares in American firms collapsed by 57% from its peak in October 2007 to a low in March this year, though it has since bounced back somewhat.

sentences.en: The expert set a value of 10, 000 dollars on the painting.
sentences.cn: 专家给这幅画定价1万美元。

means.word_mean: 实用性, 有价值, 重要性

sentences.en: Good books are of great value to students.
You don't know the value of health.
sentences.cn: 你不知道健康的重要性。

means.word_mean: 价值标准, 价值观, 职业道德, 行业准则

sentences.en: Our values and behaviour patterns are different from yours.
sentences.cn: 我们的价值观念和行为模式与你们的不同。

sentences.en: I valued the bike at 200 dollars.
sentences.cn: 我估计这辆自行车值200美元。

sentences.en: I valued my friendship with my classmates.
sentences.cn: 我珍视我和同学们之间的友谊。

sentences.en: That was the way bourgeois society valued a man.
sentences.cn: 这就是资产阶级社会评价人的方法。

jushi.english: Smoking has little value except in helping to calm the nerves.
jushi.chinese: 除了能帮助镇静外,吸烟没有什么好处。
没有什么有价值的东西被盗。
